00028 struct converter_top {
00029     converter_top() : m_base(0), m_read_only(false) {}
00030 
00031     virtual ~converter_top() {}
00032     virtual void init() {}
00033     virtual void exit() {}
00034 
00035     void set_base(base* b)      { m_base = b; }
00036     bool is_read_only() const   { return m_read_only; }
00037     void set_read_only()        { m_read_only = true; }
00038 protected:
00039     base * m_base;
00040     bool m_read_only;
00041 };
00042 
00043 struct event_module_base : base {
00044     event_module_base() ;
00045 
00046     virtual void init_event();
00047     void before_handle();
00048     void after_handle();
00049 protected:
00050     void add(converter_top* converter);
00051 
00052     typedef boost::shared_ptr<converter_top> converter_ptr;
00053     typedef std::vector<converter_ptr> converter_array;
00054     converter_array m_converters;
00055 
00056 private:
00057     bool already_inited;
00058 };

00060 
00061 template<class type> struct read_only;
00062 template<class type> inline type& access_read_only_object(read_only<type>& src);
00063 
00064 template<class type> struct read_only {
00065     read_only() : m_val( type() ) {}
00066 
00067     const type & get() const { return m_val; }
00068     operator const type & () const { return m_val; }
00069     const type* operator->() const { return &m_val; }
00070 private:
00071     template<class other_type> friend inline other_type& access_read_only_object(read_only<other_type>& src);
00072     type m_val;
00073 };
00074 
00075 template<class type> inline type& access_read_only_object(read_only<type>& src) {
00076     return src.m_val;
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00080     
00081 }}
